channel.title: absinthe on Cocktails collected by Daniel Mentiplay
channel.description: Recent content in absinthe on Cocktails collected by Daniel Mentiplay

item.title: Corpse reviver no. 2
item.description: Ingredients 20 ml gin 20 ml triple sec 20 ml Lillet Blanc 20 ml lemon juice 4 dashes absinthe cherry Instructions (Optional) rinse glass with absinthe. Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

item.title: Sazerac
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml rye whisky 5 ml sugar syrup 4 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters 4 dashes absinthe lemon twist Instructions (Optional) rinse glass with absinthe. Stirred. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with a lemon twist.
